1.3.60	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: ytsy], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
1.3.61	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: ttyy], ajñātam [11: jBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
1.3.62	indravaṃśā [12: ttjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
1.3.63	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: vātormī [11: mBtgg], indravaṃśā [12: ttjr], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], ajñātam [12: mBtr]
1.3.64	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: ytjr], ajñātam [12: mtjr], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr], ajñātam [11: tBrlg]
1.3.65	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
1.3.66	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
1.3.67	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jBjgg], ajñātam [11: yBjgl], ajñātam [11: mntgl], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

3.35.1	upajāti triṣṭubh: indravajrā [11: ttjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: tttgl]
3.35.2	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: ttyy], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], ajñātam [11: yttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
3.35.3	ajñātasamavṛtta [11: yBtgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
3.35.4	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tBjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.5	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.6	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: jBtgg], ajñātam [11: tBtgl], ajñātam [11: tBtgg]
3.35.7	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: ttyy], ajñātam [11: tBtgl], ajñātam [11: yttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.8	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
3.35.9	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: tmyy], ajñātam [12: smyj], ajñātam [11: tBtgl], ajñātam [11: mtjgg]
3.35.10	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
3.35.11	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
3.35.12	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mntgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.13	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.14	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.15	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [12: tmyj], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.16	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.17	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.18	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.19	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [12: jBsj], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.35.20	ajñātasamavṛtta [12: tByy] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

3.161.5	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
3.161.6	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.161.7	upendravajrā [11: jtjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

3.184.2	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [12: jmyy]
3.184.3	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
3.184.4	upajāti triṣṭubh: śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.184.5	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.184.6	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.184.7	upajāti triṣṭubh: śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
3.184.8	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: tBjgl], vaiśvadevī [12: mmyy], ajñātam [11: mtjgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
3.184.9	upajāti triṣṭubh: śālinī [11: mttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
3.184.10	upajāti triṣṭubh: indravajrā [11: ttjgg], ajñātam [11: jBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
3.184.11	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgl], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

3.254.18.2	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
3.254.19	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

6.20.2	śālinī [11: mttgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
6.20.3	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
6.20.4	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
6.20.5	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yttgg], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
6.20.6	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: jBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: rttgl]
6.20.7	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [12: jmsy], ajñātam [12: tmyj], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
6.20.8	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: vaiśvadevī [12: mmyy], ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
6.20.9	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: mtjgg]
6.20.10	śālinī [11: mttgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

6.20.13	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

6.73.36	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

6.73.38	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
6.73.39	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
6.73.39.2	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [tgg, sy]
6.73.40	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
6.73.41	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
6.73.41.2	ajñātasamavṛtta [5: jgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
6.73.42	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
6.73.42.2	ajñātasamavṛtta [5: tgl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
6.73.43	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]

12.275.10	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
12.275.11	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
12.275.12	indravajrā [11: ttjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
12.275.13	upajāti triṣṭubh: śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

12.296.32	upajāti jagatī: indravaṃśā [12: ttjr], ajñātam [12: ytjr], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] atha vā vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

13.15.44	upajāti jagatī: indravaṃśā [12: ttjr], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr], ajñātam [12: jtyy] atha vā vaṃśastha [12: jtjr] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
13.15.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

[13.16.3aevam astv iti tad vākyaṃ mayoktaḥ prāha śaṃkaraḥ / 	ajñātasamavṛtta [4: jl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

13.18.49	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jBtgl], ajñātam [11: tttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]

15.21.4	upajāti triṣṭubh: śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: mtjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
15.21.5	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: yttgg], ajñātam [11: mtjgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
15.21.6	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: yttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg]
15.21.7	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg]
15.21.8	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg]
15.21.9	vaiśvadevī [12: mmyy] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
15.21.10	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
15.21.11	vātormī [11: mBtgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
15.21.12	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: yttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
15.21.13	śālinī [11: mttgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)

16.5.1	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgl], ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [11: tttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.2	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.3	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.4	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgl], śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.5	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
16.5.5.2	ajñātasamavṛtta [5: tgl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
16.5.6	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgl], indravajrā [11: ttjgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgl], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
16.5.7	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
16.5.7.2	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [t, tjgg]
16.5.8	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.9	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.10	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: jttgl], ajñātam [11: jBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.11	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgg], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
16.5.12	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: tBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], ajñātam [11: yttgl]
16.5.13	ajñātasamavṛtta [11: tttgl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
16.5.14	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: jBtgl], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: tttgl]
16.5.15	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: yttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
16.5.15.2	ajñātārdhasamavṛtta [t, ttgg]
16.5.16	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: tttgg], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
16.5.17	śālinī [11: mttgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
16.5.18	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
16.5.19	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

16.5.20.2	somarājī [6: yy] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
16.5.21	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [12: ttyy], ajñātam [11: tttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], ajñātam [11: mntgl]

17.3.8	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: ytjgl], ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [11: yttgg], ajñātam [11: mtjgg]
17.3.9	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgl], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
17.3.10	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: ytjgl], ajñātam [11: mtjgl], ajñātam [12: jtyj]
17.3.11	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgl], vātormī [11: mBtgg], śālinī [11: mttgg]
17.3.12	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
17.3.13	upajāti triṣṭubh: vātormī [11: mBtgg], ajñātam [11: mtjgl], śālinī [11: mttgg]
17.3.14	upajāti triṣṭubh-jagatī-saṃkara?: ajñātam [11: yBtgg], ajñātam [12: mtjr], vaṃśastha [12: jtjr], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
17.3.15	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], śālinī [11: mttgg], upendravajrā [11: jtjgg]
17.3.16	upajāti triṣṭubh: ajñātam [11: mtjgg], ajñātam [11: jttgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
